title: Jules Thin Crust
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Counter service style pizza restaurant that serves thin crust pizza and organic salads. Flour and tomato sauce are organic. Tries to use local/ organic ingredients when possible. Offers gluten-free crust (contains eggs) and whole wheat crust (contains honey). All dressings contain honey or worcestershire sauce. At least 15 veg toppings' combinations, 2 dairy-free. Daiya vegan cheese now available.
